item.description: The highly-anticipated Magnus Archives Roleplaying Game is finally available for purchase. Based on the cult-classic podcast, the tabletop RPG hit (virtual) shelves earlier this month after raising ov...
item.content:encoded: The highly-anticipated Magnus Archives Roleplaying Game is finally available for purchase. Based on the cult-classic podcast, the tabletop RPG hit (virtual) shelves earlier this month after raising over $2 million dollars during its crowdfunding campaign in late 2023.
